details.title: Crosslinking of PVA pervaporation membrane by maleic acid
details.abstract: Maleic acid (MA) crosslinked polyvinyl alcohol (PVA) membrane is prepared using a high temperature esterification reaction between PYA and MA in the presence of sulfuric acid as a catalyst. The crosslinking reaction mechanism is investigated using FT-IR spectral analysis. The results indicate that maleic acid reacts with hydroxyl groups in PYA to form mono- and bis-ester in a two-step process.
